tasks.title: Backend Unit Test Coverage Implementation
tasks.description: Add comprehensive unit tests for critical service classes to improve code reliability and deployment confidence

Achieve minimum 70% line coverage for core business logic
Tests run successfully in CI/CD pipeline
Mock external dependencies properly

tasks.title: API Response Time Monitoring & Caching
tasks.description: Implement performance monitoring and caching layer for improved API response times
acceptance_criteria: Implement response time logging for all API endpoints
Add Redis caching layer for frequently accessed data (projects, schedules)
Cache invalidation on data updates
Performance metrics visible in logs/monitoring dashboard

tasks.title: Frontend Bundle Size Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize frontend bundle size and implement code splitting to reduce initial page load time
acceptance_criteria: Analyze and reduce bundle size by ≥15%
Implement code splitting for dashboard components
Optimize unused imports and dependencies
Lazy load non-critical features

tasks.title: Security Headers & Input Validation Enhancement
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive security measures including headers, validation, and vulnerability fixes
acceptance_criteria: Add security headers (CORS, CSP, HSTS) configuration
Implement comprehensive input validation with proper error responses
Add rate limiting for API endpoints
Scan for and fix any XSS/injection vulnerabilities

tasks.title: Database Query Performance & Indexing Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize database queries, add indexes, and implement performance monitoring for better scalability
acceptance_criteria: Analyze slow query logs and optimize N+1 queries
Add appropriate database indexes for common queries
Implement query result pagination for large datasets
Add database performance monitoring
